name: Elmo
description: Portfolio management application that allows you to manage your money by creating spending goals and tracking your movements.

name: Yummy
description: Social network of recipes where you can create and share new ones with your friends to satisfy the need of all those who need ideas for their daily meals.

name: Bullyganza
description: A dog events website where information about upcoming events will be published to keep users updated.

name: Billifier
description: Simplify invoice creation. With an intuitive interface, users can generate customized invoices quickly and easily.
